sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Salesforce.com (CRM) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 4.9%.
Year to date, Salesforce.com registers a 13.5% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is HP (HPQ), trading down 7.0%.
HP is lower by about 13.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Hasbro (HAS), trading down 6.5%, and Intuit (INTU), trading up 4.7% on the day.
